Node.definition: = action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= man and tribe; ◄ third son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel, later responsible for temple duties

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= man and tribe; ◄ third son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel, later responsible for temple duties
= process by which someone becomes pregnant
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which objects are of a high quality and/or a pleasure to look at
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= causative action by which humans bring other humans to a particular location ► in order to keep them from danger
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible
= causative action by which humans bring other humans to a particular location ► in order to keep them from danger
= container, made out of wood or papyrus, ► and made in such a way that it is able to float

= tall sedge with a smooth triangular stem, and multiple drooping, clustered flower stalks arising from the apex of the main stalk; ◄ |iCyperus papyrus|i*, found in the Nile (יְאֹר) valley; ► used for many different purposes in the Ancient Near East, such as writing material, ships, mattresses, furniture, rope, sandals, etc.
= causative action by which humans cover objects with a layer of bitumen or tar (חֵמָר)
= tarlike substance; ◄ naturally derived from petroleum; ► used in certain areas for binding together stones or bricks; also used to make objects watertight
= tarlike substance, ◄ naturally derived from petroleum, ► and used to make objects watertight

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place

meaning unsure; probably: = a reed like plant, which grows in water and reaches a height of up to 3 m high; its fuzzy brown seed head becomes fluffy and blows away in the wind; ◄ Typha genus; ► used for baskets and mats; its roots are edible
= a river ◄ flowing through Egypt from south to north; ► overflowing its banks each year and providing fertility for the fields on both sides; ≈ generally associated with Egypt's power and prosperity
= action by which humans or deities take position in a certain place for a specific purpose
= daughter of one's father, whether from the same mother or not; ≈ sometimes associated with affection; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= king of Egypt

Node.gloss: to take a bath|to bathe|to wash
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or animals wash (part of) their own body or someone else's body or another object, usually with water, ► in order to remove any dirt; ≈ the resulting cleanness often symbolizes ritual cleanness, innocence, or even holiness
= a river ◄ flowing through Egypt from south to north; ► overflowing its banks each year and providing fertility for the fields on both sides; ≈ generally associated with Egypt's power and prosperity
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
literally: hand; hence: = pertaining to the location to the left or right of an object ◄ analogous to the location of someone's hands or arms

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= woman who is the legal property of someone else; either married or eligible for marriage; her children belong to the person who owns her; ≈ because of this an אָמָה appears to have a somewhat higher status than a שִׁפְחָה even though both terms are sometimes used interchangeably

= causative action by which humans or deities allow others entrance, passage, or access (in)to a building, construction, or area ◄ by withdrawing a gate, door, window, lid, covering, or other boundary; ≈ sometimes associated with freedom, sometimes with being exposed, vulnerable

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

Node.gloss: to be concerned for|to have pity on|to show mercy|to spare
Node.definition: = process by which humans or deities experience an emotion of affection for a particular object or state of event; ► resulting in unwillingness to see that object come to harm or that event to be obstructed

= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

= king of Egypt
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= man; ◄ son of Midian (מִדְיָן) son of Keturah (קְטוּרָה) wife of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

= hole in the ground that reaches underground water; ◄ usually manmade, dug out of the ground, or hewn from rock, but may also be naturally occurring; ► used for accessing, collecting and storing water; used by shepherds as a source of water for their animals; ≈ regarded as a source of life because of its water; sometimes used as a metaphor for a woman, possibly based on the physical resemblance of the well to the vagina and its connotation as a source of life
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= man; ◄ son of Midian (מִדְיָן) son of Keturah (קְטוּרָה) wife of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= causative action by which someone draws water from a well using a receptacle attached to a rope
= causative action by which someone causes a certain location, container, or surface to be filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= receptacle, usually located near a well, where those who have drawn water can pour the water so that their animals can drink

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= causative action by which people are expelled from their dwelling place
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

Node.gloss: to be willing|to accept (to do something)
Node.definition: = state in which humans and deities are willing to do something; often used in polite speech to soften one's request or to underline its sincerity

= woman; ► daughter of Jethro (יִתְרֹו) priest of Midian (מִדְיָן) wife of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) mother of Gershom (גֵּרְשֹׁום) and Eliezer (אֱלִיעֶזֶר)
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
literally: to cry out (someone's) name (something); hence: = action by which humans assign a name to a person or place

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= man; ◄ son of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker classes within the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the widows, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which something or someone is identified as different or strange from one's own perspective
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= action by which humans or animals make a deep inarticulate sound ◄ caused by pain, grief, or severe suffering
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
literally: to come up: hence: = process by which a certain sound or information reaches the ears of someone located in a high place
= action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= action by which humans make a deep inarticulate sound ◄ caused by pain, grief, or severe suffering

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= man, also known as Abram (אַבְרָם) ◄ son of Terah (תֶּרַח) ► first patriarch of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) father of Ishmael (יִשְׁמָעֵאל) and Isaac (יִצְחָק)
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= man; ◄ son of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) and Sarah (שָׂרָה) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) father of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and Jacob (יַעֲקֹב)
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
